settings.subtitle: Monocular | Binoculars
settings.title: Infared Night Vision
settings.text:
2 in 1 for daytime or nighttime use
Accurate hunting with slope and slide angle calculation

settings.title:
NV20 | Monocular
Infared Night vision
settings.text: The digital night vision monocular is integrated with 2 in 1 functions for both daytime and night use

settings.title:
BNV20 | Binocular
Infared Night Vision
settings.text: A digital night vision binocular with a camera in large view, avaiable to take pictures, the accurate hunting mode with slope and slide angle calculation

settings.title:
NIGHT VISION WITH
Infrared Thermal Scanner
settings.text: The innovative design and technology bring you the very different experience

settings.title:
binocular
Night Vision
settings.text:
This binocular night vision with a camera, it can view objects
within a range of 100m in 100% dark environments. And 3 IR
levels help you to hunt at night, facilitate taking pictures and
creating video

settings.title:
SLOPE ON/OFF, FLAG-LOCKING <br class="br_pc">
MAKE IT EASY AND ACCURATE
settings.text: Diversified functions including scan, flag-lock, golf Slope adjusted, golf Trajectory, pulse vibration, speed measure etc

settings.title:
ERGONOMIC DESIGN <br class="br_pc">
DURABLE | CONFORTABLE
settings.text: 90% sof rubber wrap, soft touch with diversified measure functions as pulse vibration, magnetic strip, rechargeable, auto height, auto level, angle, speed and P2P measurement etc

settings.title: Photographing | Video | Night Vision
settings.text: Mileseey infrared night vision With photographing, video recording and playback function, the digital monocular take color pictures or videos in the daytime, the night vision allows viewing objects with a clear image at a distance of 200m under dark situations.

settings.testimonial: For the professional golfer, the most important partof your game is accuracy.l love Mileseey becuase it's such an accurate range finder.
settings.author: Raymond Milgram

settings.testimonial: I am a huge fan of the Mileseey brand and love the different designs so much, have bought several models as gift for my friends, they are really amazing!
settings.author: Olivia Friedle

settings.testimonial: For the professional golfer,the most important partof your game is accuracy. 1 love Blue Tees becuase it's such an accurate rangefinder.
settings.author: Alex Haynes
